Algorithm to sort numbers: 
- Start by assigning each number to a stack. 
- Establish a main queue as well. 
 - Dequeue all items from the main queue and place them in the ascending order on a temporary stack.  
- Merge the elements from the temporary stack with the original unsorted list. 
-Restore the original order by enqueuing the elements back into the main (unsorted) queue. 
-Sort complete!
